pepper.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a powder that is used to add a hot taste to food
pepper.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a hollow red, green, or yellow vegetable, eaten either raw or cooked with other food
pepper.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if something is peppered with things, it has a lot of those things in it or on it
pepper.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a speech peppered with amusing stories
The surface of the Moon is peppered with craters.
pepper.translation[1].definitions[0].not: Pepper is usually passive in this meaning
pepper.translation[1].definitions[1].def: if bullets pepper something, they hit it several times
pepper.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Machine gun fire peppered the front of the building.
